attributes.additional_details: I'm setting up this petition to get permits on whiteleas way. I'm sick of not being able to get parked outside my house due to everyone using the shops. I don't want to have to park up the street with my disabled daughter because someone has parked outside where I live to pop to the shops. Please take the time to sign this thanks.

rejection.details: This is not a matter for Government but it is the responsibility of your Local Authority to deal with.
